title: Interactive Video Service
description:
In this episode of Community Chats, Aley Hammer invites Rob Taylor, Solution Architect at AWS to discuss Amazon Interactive Video Service. Rob addresses what Amazon Interactive Service is, how it is different from the Elemental Media Suite, What kind of applications require interactivity and how this new service can handle both real time interaction and hundreds of thousands of users interacting with your stream. 

Learn more about Amazon Interactive Video Service at https://amzn.to/2BGqWSp

title: AWS What's Next ft. Amazon IVS
description:
Martin Hess, GM of Amazon IVS, Emmett Shear, CEO of Twitch and Max Stoller, Senior Product Manager, Amazon IVS demonstrates Amazon Interactive Video Service (IVS), a managed live streaming service, that gives user access to technology that powers Twitch via the AWS console. Get more information at https://amzn.to/3eVW1iy

Want to tune in live for the next episode? You can find dates and more information about our upcoming streams at - https://amzn.to/2DEiEeV 
Watch past AWS What’s Next episodes at http://bit.ly/2O3zS75 
Check out our AWS What’s Next podcast on iTunes and Spotify
